start_sources()
sources_platform(ALL)
add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Header Files"
		"BiquadIIFilter.h"
		"BiquadIIFilterBank.h"
		"CrySpatialFX.h"
		"CrySpatialFXAttachmentParams.h"
		"CrySpatialFXParams.h"
		"CrySpatialFXFactory.h"
		"CrySpatialMath.h"
		"AkUserData.h"
		"resource.h"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Source Files"
		"BiquadIIFilter.cpp"
		"CrySpatialFX.cpp"
		"CrySpatialFXAttachmentParams.cpp"
		"CrySpatialFXParams.cpp"
)
add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Root"
		"CrySpatialConfig.h"
		"stdafx.cpp"
		"stdafx.h"
)

end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

add_definitions(-DAK_OPTIMIZED)

if (AUDIO_WWISE)
CryEngineModule(CrySpatialWwiseFX PCH "stdafx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "CryEngine/Audio/Implementations/Wwise/Plugins/CrySpatial" FORCE_STATIC)
target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE "${SDK_DIR}/Audio/wwise/SDK/include" )
target_compile_options( ${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE /EHsc )

endif()
